The virgins A B C. Or, An alphabet of vertuous admonitions, for a chast, modest and well- governed maid. The tune is, The young mans A B C.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed for J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger, [London] : [1681-84]
Place and date of publication from Wing. Contains 1 illustration and illuminated capitals. Reproduction of the original in the Glasgow University Library.
